short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses Groq to summarize or interact with the content of the current page or selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Groq Summary is a Chrome extension that uses Groq to summarize or interact with the content of the current page or selected text.

Uses Groq to summarize or interact with the content of the current page or selected text.

Groq Summary is a Chrome extension that uses LLMs powered by Groq to summarize or interact with the content of the current page or selected text.

Note this extension requires a Groq API key to work. You can get yours for free at https://console.groq.com
